resources.string: "Select your prefered Wash Program using the dial or selecting the button. Press the center of the dial to start the program.\n\nCreate a custom wash program by selecting the 'Customize Program' button or customize a default program by selecting the program and then pressing the 'Customize Program' button.
"Stain Menu\n\nSelect the stain type on the left to begin.
Adjust your HVAC application settings here.
"Maintenance Menu\n\nSelect a maintenance area on the left to begin.
